content: deering pullover wan cheng phua © copyright 2025 knittygrittysg com construction the deering pullover is constructed top down beginning with the cabled saddle shoulders the front and back are knitted flat with armhole shaping the pieces are joined in the round for the body the cable motifs begin slightly under the full bust shaping the body inwards to the waist hem no decreases needed lastly armbands and a thick cosy neckband are added garment measurements sizes 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 bust circumference 90 100 110 5 120 5 130 5 141 151 161 171 5 cm 35 5 39 25 43 5 47 5 51 5 55 5 59 5 63 5 67 5 inches the pullover is designed to have about 18 to 23 cm 7 to 9 inches of positive ease around the bust the sample shown was knit in size 2 modelled with 18 5 cm 7¼ inches of positive ease difficulty level intermediate pattern involves shortrows and cables yarn suggested yarn nirani luxe yarns yak silk dk 60% merino 20% yak 20% silk 212 meters / 100 grams sample is in emerald yarn quantities 510 550 630 680 730 780 830 880 930 metres 558 601 689 744 798 853 908 962 1017 yards needles and gauge suggested needles 4 5 mm 24 or medium circumference circular needles for body 3 5 mm 24 or medium circumference circular needles for ribbing gauge using 4 5 mm needles in stockinette 20 sts and 27 row = 10 cm by 10 cm swatch wan cheng phua © copyright 2025 knittygrittysg com abbreviations st s stitch es rs right side of the work ws wrong side of the work p purl k knit cn cable needle sl slip purlwise 6/6 lc 6 over 6 left cable sl6 onto cn hold cn in front of work k6 from sts on cn k6 6/6 rc 6 over 6 right cable sl6 onto cn hold cn behind work k6 from sts on cn k6 repeat instructions within brackets ds double stitch as in german shortrows k2tog knit 2 together p2tog purl 2 together m1l make one left knit m1r make one right knit ssk slip slip knit m stitch marker sm slip marker rm remove marker pm place marker bor beginning of round wan cheng phua © copyright 2025 knittygrittysg com pattern instructions shoulder saddles with 4 5 mm needles cast on 24 sts row 1 rs k2 p1 k18 p1 k2 row 2 ws p2 k1 p18 k1 p2 row 3 to 6 repeat row 1 and 2 two times row 7 k2 p1 6/6 lc k6 p1 k2 row 8 to 12 repeat row 2 to 6 row 13 k2 p1 k6 6/6 rc p1 k2 row 14 to 18 repeat row 2 to 6 repeat row 7 to 18 2 2 2 2 2 2 3 3 3 more times bind off all stitches in pattern and break yarn your shoulder saddle should measure
